translation.en: Everything happens for a reason.
Think about that for a moment.
All your efforts...
personal, professional, carnal...
utter and absolute slaves...
to some cosmically predetermined set of outcomes.
translation.it: ...di una serie di risultati predeterminati a livello cosmico.

translation.en: As if we have no say in, let alone culpability for,
translation.it: Come se non avessimo né voce in capitolo, né responsabilità

translation.en: the defining moments in our lives.
translation.it: per gli attimi cruciali delle nostre vite.

translation.en: If you want a life of purpose...
translation.it: Se volete avere uno scopo nella vita...

translation.en: by inverting the notion...
that everything happens for a reason.
Redefine it.
Not as some future explanation
for terrible tragedy,
or glorious achievement,
but as validation...
of the deliberate choices that lead us to these critical junctures
translation.it: ....che sono proprio le scelte volontarie a condurci

translation.en: in the first place.
Assert authority over chance, fate,
and destiny, because everything does happen for a reason.
translation.it: sul destino, perché tutto accade per una ragione.

translation.en: And that reason is you.
To attain elite success,
you must be willing to make the hard choices,
translation.it: dovete essere disposti a prendere decisioni difficili,

translation.en: do the unpleasant things,
risk your most valuable assets,
translation.it: rischiare quanto avete di più caro

translation.en: and do away with the shackles designed by society to limit us:
translation.it: e liberarvi dalle catene progettate dalla società per porci dei limiti:

translation.en: love, marriage, children.
And above all,
the uninvited imposition
of lesser people's moral agendas.
Because nothing worthwhile
translation.it: Perché non si raggiunge alcun risultato di valore,

translation.en: is ever achieved without sacrifice.
translation.it: Perché non si raggiunge alcun risultato di valore, senza sacrificio.

translation.en: And true greatness...
only comes to those...
willing to pursue it...
at...
any cost.
[man on laptop] Ladies, gentlemen, Mr. and Mrs. Sean Donovan!
translation.it: UN ANNO DOPO Signore e signori, il signor e la signora Donovan.

translation.en: Ah, let's see it. Come on, kiss her!
-[applause] -Yeah!
[guard] Hold on there, miss!
May I help you?
Oh, hello again, Mrs. Donovan.
Hi.
Sorry.
I have some legal paperwork for Miss Montgomery.
translation.it: Ho dei documenti per la signora Montgomery.

translation.en: I'm just gonna run up for a quick signature.
Uh, I still need to call you up.
It's really coming down out there, huh?
Hey! Wait! Wait!
This is Lisa Donovan, and I need to speak with my husband right now.
translation.it: Sono Lisa Donovan, devo parlare subito con mio marito!

translation.en: Hello? Can anybody hear me?
-[elevator bell dings] -Fuck.
Call it off!
[woman on radio] Forecast for the Bay Area today will be cool and breezy
translation.it: TRE GIORNI PRIMA Per la giornata di oggi si prevede tempo fresco e ventilato...

translation.en: -with high's mainly in the 60s. -[dog barking]
translation.it: Per la giornata di oggi si prevede tempo fresco e ventilato...

translation.en: [man chuckles] All right, all right.
Castro, I get it. I get it. I get it.
We'll go on a walk.
Just let me get my pants on, and we'll get out there in two minutes.
translation.it: Metto i pantaloni e tra due minuti siamo fuori.

translation.en: All right. I see you. I see you. We're going outside right now. Give me a second.
translation.it: Ok. Ho capito. Sì, ora usciamo. Dammi un secondo.

translation.en: Will you be here when we get back for a proper good morning?
translation.it: Ti troverò qui a darmi un buongiorno come si deve?

translation.en: I wish. I have to stop by the lab before my first pitch.
translation.it: Magari, devo andare in laboratorio prima del discorso.

translation.en: I needed to make sure that my presentation transferred.
translation.it: Devo assicurarmi che la presentazione sia stata inviata.

translation.en: I know the feeling.
First pitch is always the scariest. Just gotta stay in the moment.
translation.it: La prima volta è sempre la peggiore. Concentrati sul presente.

translation.en: Try not to think of all the things you can't control, focus on what you can.
translation.it: Pensa solo alle cose che sai di poter controllare.

translation.en: What if I freeze?
First Triple-A game I played... Giants sent their scouts down.
translation.it: Nella mia prima partita Triple-A, i Giants mandarono i loro talent scout.

translation.en: On my first windup, my cleat broke off my shoe
translation.it: Al mio primo caricamento, il tacchetto della scarpa si ruppe e la palla finì

translation.en: and the ball sailed about five feet over the catcher.
translation.it: Al mio primo caricamento, il tacchetto della scarpa si ruppe e la palla finì un metro e mezzo sopra il ricevitore.

translation.en: I knew if I didn't pull it together right then, I'd never get another shot.
translation.it: Se non mi fossi ripreso subito, non avrei avuto altre occasioni.

translation.en: So...
I picked up the cleat,
translation.it: presi il tacchetto e me lo misi in tasca, come simbolo

translation.en: and put in my pocket as a symbol of all the obstacles,
translation.it: presi il tacchetto e me lo misi in tasca, come simbolo di tutti gli ostacoli,

translation.en: real and imagined, bouncing around inside my head.
translation.it: reali e immaginari, che mi frullavano in testa.

translation.en: Figured if I could condense all that noise into something smaller to fit in a pocket...
translation.it: Immaginai di poterli rimpicciolire e farli entrare in una tasca.

translation.en: then all my self-doubt could be managed.
translation.it: Così potevo gestire la mia insicurezza.

translation.en: Threw my first no-hitter that day.
translation.it: Quel giorno realizzai il mio primo no-hitter.

translation.en: You're gonna crush it.
Thank you.
-Come on, Castro. -[Castro barks]
Good morning. My name is Lisa Ruiz-Donovan,
and I am seeking an equity partner for my medical solutions company,
translation.it: e sto cercando un socio paritario per la mia società di soluzioni mediche,

translation.en: Emigen Molecular Sequencing. Emigen Molecular Sequencing. Emigen Molecular Sequencing.
-Hmm. -Good job, young lady.
Thanks for coming in. This isn't an area we're interested in exploring.
translation.it: - Grazie per essere venuta. - Non è un'area che ci interessa.

translation.en: Let us talk and get back to you.
translation.it: Ne discuteremo e le faremo sapere.

translation.en: Everybody's hard at work, I see.
Anymore billion-dollar breakthroughs?
translation.it: Offerte da un milione di dollari?

translation.en: -Just the one. -Minus the billion.
Any calls, Sophie? Landlord.
translation.it: - Ha chiamato qualcuno? - Il proprietario dell'ufficio.

translation.en: -Want me to get him? -I'll call from my desk.
translation.it: - Vuoi che lo richiami? - Faccio io.

translation.en: -Did you eat? -Yep.
Both feet.
Scratched three VCs off the list.
Before I make this call, please tell me there's enough in our account to cover rent.
translation.it: Dimmi che abbiamo i soldi per pagare l'affitto.

translation.en: Yeah, for two months.
But payroll is another story.
I know you don't want to hear this,
translation.it: So che non vuoi sentirtelo dire,

translation.en: but I think it's time we consider approaching the drug companies.
translation.it: ma dovremmo considerare le aziende farmaceutiche.

translation.en: No way. They would just buy us to kill us.
True, but at least you would get your money back.
translation.it: Almeno avresti indietro i tuoi soldi.

translation.en: You haven't taken a salary since we started this thing.
And you could be making five times what I'm paying you anyplace else.
translation.it: E tu guadagneresti cinque volte tanto altrove.

translation.en: -Ten. -See?
You're in for the cause, same as I am.
translation.it: Credi anche tu in questa causa, proprio come me.

translation.en: I would deny that in court, bankruptcy or otherwise.
translation.it: Lo negherei davanti al giudice per bancarotta o altro.

translation.en: Fine, I will continue to help you on your hunt for the golden ticket.
translation.it: Ok, continuerò ad aiutarti nella caccia al biglietto vincente.

translation.en: As long as you promise to rework your pitch.
translation.it: A patto che tu riveda il tuo discorso.

translation.en: What's wrong with my pitch? We fact-checked it a hundred times.
translation.it: Cos'ha che non va? Lo abbiamo verificato cento volte.

translation.en: Facts are not your problem.
It's emotional engagement.
I know this is outside of your comfort zone.
translation.it: So che non sei a tuo agio a parlarne,

translation.en: But you already have your way in.
translation.it: ma hai già quello che ti serve.

translation.en: You just have to use it.
[woman] Catch us up, guys.
Trevor McIntire, seven years old, pulled a frying pan of hot grease onto his head.
translation.it: Trevor McIntire, sette anni, ustionato con l'olio di una padella.

translation.en: -Guardian? -Welfare mom. Still trying to locate her.
Looks like old scarring under the new injury. Let's get him up to Burn One for a head-to-toe.
translation.it: Sembra ci sia una vecchia cicatrice sotto. Portiamolo al reparto ustioni.

translation.en: You've got a nice strong arm there, Trev.
translation.it: Hai un braccio molto forte, Trev.

translation.en: You like baseball?
I'm gonna go up with him.
Hang in there, little man. All right?
Giants sure could use a guy like you in the bullpen.
translation.it: I Giants ti ingaggerebbero di sicuro.

translation.en: [Sean] Hey, Todd.
-I'll catch you back at the van. -Yeah.
Ooh, hey, Doc, can I get some attention over here? It hurts when I do this.
translation.it: Ehi, dottore. Mi fa male quando faccio così.

translation.en: Oh. [chuckles] Maybe you should stop doing that.
I don't know, I can't seem to help myself. It's automatic when I get around a certain someone.
translation.it: Non posso farci niente. Mi succede quando mi avvicino a lei.

translation.en: Todd, please. Can't you see this isn't the time or the place?
translation.it: Tyler, non è né il posto, né il momento adatto.

translation.en: Hmm. Well, what I could see is you looking a little tense,
so I thought I'd try to put a smile on your face.
translation.it: così ho pensato di farti sorridere un po'.

translation.en: [Todd] What's wrong?
We just lost a patient on the table.
Oh, babe, I'm sorry.
On top of that, we're short-staffed again.
translation.it: E siamo di nuovo a corto di personale.

translation.en: And since I'm the low resident on the totem pole,
I'm forced to pick up the slack.
Well, as long as I've known you,
translation.it: Da quando ti conosco, nessuno ti ha mai costretto

translation.en: no one's ever forced you to do something you don't wanna do, Ange.
translation.it: Da quando ti conosco, nessuno ti ha mai costretto a fare niente, Ang. Puoi sempre dire di no.

translation.en: You can always say no.
translation.it: a fare niente, Ang. Puoi sempre dire di no.

translation.en: You're right.
I need to have that conversation. My girl. See you at home.
translation.it: - Dovrei parlarne. - Così ti riconosco. Ci vediamo a casa.

translation.en: Okay. Bye.
You sure I can go? -Stop. -You sure I'm good?
[man] Name your crime, Todd.
I don't know.
I'd kill Hitler. I'd for sure kill Hitler.
That's not a confession, that's more a moral imperative.
translation.it: Non è una confessione, è un obbligo morale.

translation.en: Angela, show your man how it's done. Yeah, no, there are too many guy questions in this bowl.
translation.it: - Angela, mostragli come si fa. - Ci sono troppe domande per uomini.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, everyone.
This party is no longer accepting apologies, only confessions.
translation.it: Non si accettano scuse, solo confessioni. Tocca a te.

translation.en: I thought maybe you'd retire this game along with my brother's 20s.
translation.it: Non avevate abbandonato questo gioco dopo il 20° compleanno di mio fratello?

translation.en: Forever young, baby, forever young.
Uh... "Would you ever have sex with someone
while you're in a relationship with someone else?"
-Oh. -I'm guessing this is yours, Lionel. All the good ones are.
translation.it: - Questa è tua, Lionel. - Sempre le migliori.

translation.en: Hold on. We talking, like, swinging, hall pass,
translation.it: Parliamo di scambio di coppia, sesso libero

translation.en: or whatever's trendy with the gay boys these days?
translation.it: o qualsiasi cosa sia di moda tra i gay?

translation.en: Ooh! I'm talking complete and total transparency.
translation.it: Parlo di trasparenza totale e assoluta.

translation.en: Sex can be in the same room with multiple people.
translation.it: Il sesso può essere con più persone nella stessa stanza.

translation.en: Sorry to disappoint, but I already got all the man I can handle.
translation.it: Mi spiace deludervi, ma io sono a posto così.

translation.en: [kiss] He's enough for me.
What? Look, look.
If it's all above board then I'm definitely, definitely
translation.it: Cosa? Se dobbiamo essere onesti, io ordinerei senza alcun dubbio

translation.en: order me up a hot meat sandwich with two slices
translation.it: io ordinerei senza alcun dubbio una cosa a tre con Jennifer Lopez e la mia dolce signora.

translation.en: of J-Lo and my sweet lady Angela.
translation.it: una cosa a tre con Jennifer Lopez e la mia dolce signora.

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, baby, nobody asked you.
Um, will you excuse me while I try to wipe that out of my brain?
Okay, so you're saying if you could have a no harm, no foul,
translation.it: Stai dicendo che, se potessi fare sesso una volta sola

translation.en: one-off with one of your favorite Backstreet Boys, you'd say no?
translation.it: con il tuo Backstreet Boys preferito, diresti di no?

translation.en: I might have mentioned
your bedroom ceiling was covered in Backstreet posters growing up.
translation.it: della tua stanza tappezzata dei loro poster.

translation.en: So was yours. Amen, sister.
translation.it: - Come la tua. - Ben detto, sorella.

translation.en: -Hey, cake's in the fridge. -Okay.
translation.it: - La torta è nel frigo. - Ok.

translation.en: All right. Well, who's next?
Yeah, well, that makes two of us, I guess.
-Oh, sorry. -No. It's fine.
It's nothing.
-Would you mind handing me that lighter? -Yes.
Who is that?
It's the chief of surgery.
Is there a problem at the hospital?
[Sean] What's the holdup in here?
Marcos will only be 30 for a year.
translation.it: Ci stiamo facendo vecchi di là.

translation.en: Why don't you pass out the plates and forks and we'll be out in just a sec?
translation.it: Perché intanto non distribuisci piattini e forchette?

translation.en: Yeah, sure thing.
I didn't mean for any of this to happen.
It just happened.
What does that mean for you and Todd?
translation.it: E adesso, fra te e Todd?

translation.en: I don't know.
I keep telling myself I'm gonna end it, but...
translation.it: Continuo a dirmi che deve finire, ma...

translation.en: Look, promise me you won't say anything.
It will kill Todd to hear this secondhand, especially coming from Sean.
translation.it: Todd ne morirebbe, specie se lo sapesse da Sean.

translation.en: Angela... I'm not asking you to lie.
translation.it: - Angela... - Non ti sto chiedendo di mentire.

translation.en: I just need time to figure everything out.
translation.it: Mi serve solo un po' di tempo per capire.

translation.en: Promise me, Lisa.
[woman] How are you feeling about the pitch?
Way less comfortable than I was with the fact-y figure-y version.
translation.it: Mi sento meno a mio agio rispetto alla vecchia versione,

translation.en: But objectively, I know you pointed me in the right direction.
translation.it: ma devo ammettere che mi hai indicato la giusta direzione.

translation.en: Good, 'cause Gage Scott Ventures wants to meet with you tomorrow at 4:00.
translation.it: Bene, perché quelli della Gage Scott vogliono incontrarti domani.

translation.en: Wait, what? I thought they weren't interested.
That was before Mr. Scott found out there was a competitive bid from his old firm.
translation.it: Ma ora il sig. Scott ha saputo dell'offerta della sua vecchia azienda.

translation.en: So we're peddling fake news now?
translation.it: Quindi mettiamo in giro notizie false?

translation.en: I didn't make the rules, I'm just playing the game.
translation.it: Non detto io le regole. Gioco e basta.

translation.en: I thought a little FOMO would go a long way with a guy like that.
translation.it: Sapevo che uno come lui non avrebbe resistito.

translation.en: As it turns out, I was right.
You're an evil genius.
I know. By the way, I am sending you the link.
translation.it: Lo so. Comunque, ti mando il link.

translation.en: This guy's got some seriously stereotypical taste in women.
translation.it: Quest'uomo non ha fantasia in fatto di donne.

translation.en: You might want to consider wearing something a little less business-y and a little more--
translation.it: Dovresti indossare qualcosa di meno professionale e un po' più...

translation.en: -Demeaning? -Don't be naive. We can't afford it.
[Sean] Dog's walked, garbage curbed, dishes done...
translation.it: Cane ok, rifiuti fuori, piatti lavati.

translation.en: Okay to come to bed or you need to keep going?
translation.it: Posso venire a letto o devi lavorare?

translation.en: Why couldn't Sean have a twin who's into a work-obsessed Fortnite enthusiast,
translation.it: Perché Sean non ha un gemello maniaco di lavoro e Fortnite,

translation.en: pushing the dark side of her 20s?
You'd only break his heart, Cassidy.
Not before breaking his balls.
Don't keep her up too late, Romeo. She's got a misogynist dragon to slay.
translation.it: Non farle fare tardi, Romeo. Un miliardario misogino l'aspetta.

translation.en: Oh... my God.
How did you even get that on?
You ready to bring some sexy back?
That's the wrong...
boy band and singer. [laughs]
Come here.
You and Angela settle whatever was going on in the kitchen earlier?
translation.it: Con Angela avete chiarito, qualsiasi cosa fosse?

translation.en: Yeah. She's just working through an issue with a co-worker
translation.it: Sì, ha solo qualche problema con un collega

translation.en: and needed to get some of it off her chest.
Well, she's been married to Todd since high school.
translation.it: È sposata con Todd dai tempi del liceo.

translation.en: If Angela can make that work, whatever this is should be no problem.
translation.it: Se hanno resistito a questo, il resto non è un problema.

translation.en: What else?
You worried about the company?
I just don't wanna let everyone down.
translation.it: È che non voglio deludere nessuno.

translation.en: Least of all, you. Nothing you do could ever let me down.
translation.it: - Soprattutto te. - Non potresti mai deludermi.

translation.en: It's all gonna be okay.
How do you know?
Because we've got each other.
[Lisa] This little munchkin with the devilish grin
is my sister, Emilia.
That's my brother Marcos,
and the little girl with the unfortunate pair of trifocals is yours truly.
translation.it: e la ragazzina con quei terribili occhiali sono io.

translation.en: Our mother used to say, whatever mischief one of us didn't conjure up, the other two would.
translation.it: Mia madre diceva sempre che eravamo in perfetta sintonia sulle marachelle.

translation.en: And she was right. We were...
inseparable growing up.
The three amigos.
But obviously, it's not your real family we're talking about here, right?
translation.it: Ovviamente non parliamo della sua vera famiglia.

translation.en: My birth parents were killed in a house fire when I was three.
translation.it: I mie genitori rimasero uccisi in un incendio quando avevo tre anni.

translation.en: My nanny ended up adopting me so I wouldn't become a ward of the state, so...
translation.it: La mia tata mi adottò per non farmi dare in affido, quindi...

translation.en: yeah, this is my real family.
translation.it: Sì, questa è la mia vera famiglia.

translation.en: Here's Emilia again with her hospital suitemate Tiffany.
translation.it: Ecco Emilia con la sua compagna di stanza in ospedale, Tiffany.

translation.en: Both were diagnosed with acute lymphocytic leukemia at age eight.
translation.it: Entrambe furono colpite a otto anni dalla leucemia linfatica acuta.

translation.en: This is six months into treatment.
translation.it: Qui sono a sei mesi di trattamento.

translation.en: As you can see, Tiffany is thriving...
translation.it: Come vedete, Tiffany sta crescendo sana.

translation.en: while Emilia...
is struggling.
Acute lymphocytic leukemia, is a curable disease.
translation.it: La leucemia linfatica acuta è curabile.

translation.en: The drug protocol designed to fight it produces a 90 percent survival rate.
translation.it: I farmaci impiegati nel trattamento portano alla guarigione nel 90% dei casi.

translation.en: Unfortunately, because of a genetic deviation
translation.it: Purtroppo però, a causa di una mutazione genetica

translation.en: in some children's immune cell checkpoints,
translation.it: dei checkpoint immunitari in alcuni bambini,

translation.en: the treatment is rendered ineffectual for them.
translation.it: il trattamento per loro non funziona.

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday to you... ♪
[Lisa] My little sister lost her battle six days before her ninth birthday.
translation.it: Mia sorella perse la sua battaglia sei giorni prima del suo nono compleanno.

translation.en: If it were me who had gotten sick instead of her,
translation.it: Se mi fossi ammalata io al suo posto,

translation.en: we'd likely both be alive, and...
I might not have devoted my life to this cause.
translation.it: e non avrei dedicato tutta la vita a questa causa.

translation.en: What we're working towards at Emigen,
is a customized map of the blockers and receptors
translation.it: a una mappa su misura dei bloccanti e dei ricettori

translation.en: in every human being's unique immune system
translation.it: del sistema immunitario di ogni essere umano,

translation.en: so that drug companies can optimize medications
translation.it: affinché i farmaci possano esseri ottimizzati

translation.en: to work on all patients battling a life-threatening disease...
translation.it: e funzionino su tutti i pazienti interessati.

translation.en: not just the lucky ones.
translation.it: E non solo sui più fortunati.

translation.en: It's, um...
It's a very impressive presentation.
I can honestly say with...
every fiber of what some tell me is a very jaded heart...
translation.it: ...con ogni fibra del mio, a detta di alcuni, "insensibile" cuore,

translation.en: that nothing would make me happier than to invest in your company.
translation.it: che sarei davvero felice di investire nella sua compagnia.

translation.en: [man] But I see a flaw in your proposal that just can't be overlooked.
translation.it: Ma nella sua proposta c'è una falla che non si può trascurare.

translation.en: I'm afraid big pharma would drown us in litigation
translation.it: Le grandi aziende farmaceutiche ci farebbero causa

translation.en: before we even got in the game.
Hey, I'm sorry about your sister.
I, uh, I wish there was more I could do.
Yeah, I get that a lot.
Ma'am.
Oh, thank you.
Hey, bartender, how about something cheap and wet?
translation.it: Ehi, barista, che ne dice di qualcosa di economico e gratificante?

translation.en: You asking or offering?
translation.it: È una proposta o una richiesta?

translation.en: What's it look like?
Looks like you could use a bubble bath and some black coffee.
translation.it: Che ti servirebbero un bagno caldo e del caffè.

translation.en: As it happens...
that's our special tonight.
What's this?
I got us a room overlooking the Bay Bridge.
translation.it: Ho preso una stanza con vista.

translation.en: We're celebrating.
How is it possible that you're not... [laughs]
...reading this picture?
No investor will touch me,
my staff is about to be unemployed.
[fighting back tears] Both your life savings and the loan my parents gave me
translation.it: I tuoi risparmi e il prestito dei miei genitori

translation.en: has evaporated.
And we can't... [sobs]
We can't afford a room overlooking the Bay Bridge.
You can't solve all the world's problems. You knew that going into this.
translation.it: Non puoi risolvere tutti i problemi. Conoscevi i rischi.

translation.en: That's one.
Two, the hotel room is free,
courtesy of one very cool night manager.
translation.it: regalo di un fantastico portiere notturno.

translation.en: Three, if your company does go under, your employees knew the risks and they're all smart enough to land on their feet.
translation.it: Terzo, se la tua società fallisce, i tuoi dipendenti sapranno come cavarsela.

translation.en: We're gonna pay back every cent your parents lent us.
translation.it: Restituiremo ai tuoi genitori ogni singolo centesimo.

translation.en: I'll... rob a bank if I have to.
You would, wouldn't you?
Room 4703.
Give me half an hour to shut the bar down. No one's coming out in this rain anyway.
translation.it: Dammi mezz'ora. Non verrà nessun'altro, con questo tempo.

translation.en: -Mm? -I'm sorry.
I love you.
Get out of here.
[sighs] Last call!
[woman] I'll have a gin martini.
One olive, very dry.
Sorry.
Didn't see you there.
What kind of gin do you prefer?
Which do you prefer?
[chuckles] I drink whiskey.
I'd have brought it over to you.
Mm. I don't like to drink alone.
translation.it: Non mi piace bere da sola.

translation.en: Pour yourself a whiskey.
[chuckles] Can't. Company rules.
Won't tell if you won't.
To your health.
Haven't seen you in here before. You staying at the hotel?
translation.it: Non l'ho mai vista qui. Alloggia in hotel?

translation.en: Well, I hope you don't live far.
It's coming down hard out there.
I have a driver. Driver has an umbrella.
translation.it: Ho un autista. Che ha un ombrello.

translation.en: He can take us wherever it is you go,
when you clock out of there.
No, thank you.
I'm really flattered, but, uh...
I'm married.
All I was offering was a ride.
translation.it: Le stavo offrendo solo un passaggio.

translation.en: Oh, damn. [chuckles] I'm...
I'm sorry. Please forget I said that.
Sometimes when it gets late, people tend to get a little--
translation.it: A volte, di sera, la gente diventa un po'...

translation.en: Frisky.
translation.it: A volte, di sera, la gente diventa un po'... Vivace.

translation.en: Yeah.
Then what?
And then nothing.
I'm married.
Right.
To that emotional girl who just made a spectacle of herself.
translation.it: Con quella ragazza emotiva che ha appena dato spettacolo.

translation.en: That girl's the most important thing in my world.
translation.it: È la cosa più importante della mia vita.

translation.en: And today was a terrible day for her.
translation.it: È stata una giornataccia per lei.

translation.en: Enjoy your drink.
Now who's been misunderstood? Let's just call it even.
translation.it: - Ora chi è stato frainteso? - Siamo pari.

translation.en: Let's.
But now you've got me curious.
From where I'm sitting, she's a very lucky woman.
translation.it: Di certo, è una donna molto fortunata.

translation.en: This wife of yours.
Tell me about her.
That's more like it.
You feeling any better?
Hmm... I'm not feeling any worse.
Sorry you married such a train wreck.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, hai sposato un disastro.

translation.en: Ah, don't worry about it.
I actually met a woman after you staggered up here.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto una, dopo che te ne sei andata.

translation.en: Can't say I blame you.
I hope you two will be very happy together.
[chuckles] I think she's a little more your type than mine.
translation.it: Credo che sia più il tuo tipo.

translation.en: [Sean] Said you'd know who she is.
I don't-- Is this a joke?
I don't know. Maybe. Who is this lady?
translation.it: Non lo so. Forse. Chi è?

translation.en: Only one of the most aggressive venture capitalists in town,
translation.it: Solo uno dei finanziatori più aggressivi della città

translation.en: and by all accounts... born of a jackal.
translation.it: e, a quanto si dice, una specie di sciacallo.

translation.en: She definitely struck me as the kind of woman who gets what she wants.
translation.it: Mi sembra una che ottiene quello che vuole.

translation.en: And what she wants is to meet my wife.
Wait.
You... told her about me?
Just the basics.
She's hosting some big investor thing and wants to hear more about Emigen.
translation.it: Vorrebbe saperne di più sulla Emigen.

translation.en: Think you can...
squeeze the jackal onto your calendar?
I can squeeze a lot more than that.
Morning, Cassidy. You're in early.
-Late, actually. -You were in all night?
translation.it: In ritardo, direi. Sei stata qui tutta la notte?

translation.en: What in the world were you doing?
translation.it: Sei stata qui tutta la notte?

translation.en: Making sure we didn't overlook any potential Hail Marys.
translation.it: Ad assicurarmi di non perdere opportunità dell'ultimo minuto.

translation.en: That, and a fistful of Adderall.
Unfortunately, you hired a very thorough CFO.
translation.it: Per tua sfortuna, hai assunto un CFO molto meticoloso.

translation.en: I think we're out of options, Lis.
What if I told you that we were gonna make a run
translation.it: Sicura? E se ti dicessi che potremmo provarci

translation.en: at Anne Montgomery?
Well, I'd ask you if you hit your head.
translation.it: Ti chiederei se hai battuto la testa.

translation.en: You don't just demand a meeting with Anne Montgomery. She'd have you executed.
translation.it: Non puoi chiederle un appuntamento. Ti farebbe giustiziare.

translation.en: I didn't have to.
She offered.
She... offered?
Do you know how hard I worked to get us in the door with that woman?
translation.it: Hai idea di cosa ho dovuto fare per contattarla?

translation.en: -What did you do? -I promise I'll tell you the story later.
translation.it: - Come hai fatto? - Te lo dirò dopo.

translation.en: Now I have to cram my brain full of everything I need to win her over.
translation.it: Ora devo concentrarmi su come fare per conquistarla.

translation.en: Start and stop right there.
That has been out for less than a week, and I've already read through it, like, four times.
translation.it: È uscito meno di una settimana fa e l'ho già letto quattro volte.

translation.en: She is my spirit animal.
Really?
Everything I've read about her makes her seem kind of... horrible.
translation.it: Ho sempre pensato che fosse una persona orribile.

translation.en: The world's a horrible place, but Anne Montgomery wakes up every morning and she eats it for breakfast.
translation.it: Il mondo è un posto orribile, ma lei se lo mangia a colazione.

translation.en: Mrs. McIntire?
It's the EMTs who brought your son to the hospital yesterday.
translation.it: Siamo i paramedici che hanno accompagnato suo figlio.

translation.en: Got him a get well present.
I'll just leave it here by the door, okay?
Do you smell smoke?
Mrs. McIntire!
Unit 19 shelter fire, 38 East 19th Street!
-[fire alarm blaring] -Everybody out, now!
Mrs. McIntire!
[child] Help!
Help us!
Help!
[Sean] Come on! We gotta get you out of here!
Mom and kids checked out okay. Social services has them.
translation.it: Stanno bene. Ci penseranno i servizi sociali.

translation.en: Cops found the father holed up in the basement. Got a list of convictions a mile long.
translation.it: La polizia ha trovato il padre in cantina. Ha un bel po' di condanne.

translation.en: [Todd] Assault, possession, trafficking, aggravated child abuse.
translation.it: Aggressione, possesso di armi, traffico di droga, abuso su minori.

translation.en: No way this guy should've ever made parole.
translation.it: Non avrebbe mai dovuto avere la condizionale.

translation.en: Hey, whatever's going through your head, it's not worth it.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa tu abbia in mente, non farla.

translation.en: Sean, I'm serious, man. Don't do this. Hey.
Sean, what the fuck, man?
You the paramedics who rescued that family?
-Yes, sir. -[man] You two boys are real heroes.
translation.it: - Sì, signore. - Siete dei veri eroi.

translation.en: Whole place could've gone up.
Heard one of you applied for the academy.
translation.it: Uno di voi ha fatto domanda nei pompieri?

translation.en: We both did.
-What are your names? -Todd Archer, Sean Donovan.
translation.it: - Come vi chiamate? - Todd Archer e Sean Donovan.

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Sean and Lisa Donovan to see Miss Montgomery.
translation.it: I signori Sean e Lisa Donovan sono qui.

translation.en: Welcome. I'll let her know you've arrived.
[woman] Oh, thank you very much.
[man] Excuse me.
You know that guy?
[Lisa] Not exactly.
[Foster] If you wouldn't mind stepping into the library, Miss Montgomery will be with you shortly.
translation.it: Se volete accomodarvi di là, la signora vi raggiungerà fra un attimo.

translation.en: Hello, Sean. Don't get up. I can't spare much time.
translation.it: Ciao, Sean. Non alzarti. Non posso restare per molto.

translation.en: You must be Lisa.
Yes. Thank you for the meeting, Miss Montgomery.
I'll get right to it. No. No need for that.
translation.it: - Vado subito al dunque. - No. Non serve.

translation.en: I've done my homework. You wouldn't be here otherwise.
translation.it: Ho studiato. Altrimenti non sareste qui.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Oh, don't thank me yet.
Many of my competitors, like that nauseatingly arrogant Gage Scott,
translation.it: Molti dei miei avversari, come quell'arrogante di Gage Scott,

translation.en: whom your husband told me passed on your pitch, make decisions out of fear.
I operate on potential.
Which is something I believe your company has in spades.
translation.it: E credo che la tua società ne abbia un bel po'.

translation.en: It's you I'm not sold on.
translation.it: Sei tu che non mi convinci.

translation.en: How can I convince you otherwise?
Have you read my latest book?
translation.it: Hai letto il mio ultimo libro?

translation.en: -Studied it. -Oh, is that so?
So tell me...
are you two planning on having children?
-Yeah. -Some day.
Right now, I am one hundred percent focused on Emigen.
translation.it: Ora sono concentrata al 100% sulla Emigen.

translation.en: One hundred percent?
I know you consider the correlation
between personal sacrifice and elite success
translation.it: tra il sacrificio della vita privata e il successo

translation.en: to be one of the cornerstones of your business doctrine.
translation.it: uno dei capisaldi della sua idea di business.

translation.en: Not a cornerstone. The foundation.
translation.it: Non è un caposaldo, ne è la base.

translation.en: What I mean to say is I am fully prepared for this opportunity.
translation.it: Quello che voglio dire è che sono pronta per quest'opportunità.

translation.en: Nothing is more important to me.
translation.it: Niente conta di più per me.

translation.en: Not even your marriage?
What kind of question is that?
It's a question for your wife.
I assume Sean told you how we met?
translation.it: Sean ti avrà detto come ci siamo incontrati.

translation.en: He said you struck up a conversation at the hotel bar.
Did he also mention that he thought I was coming on to him?
translation.it: Ti avrà anche detto che pensava che cercassi di sedurlo.

translation.en: Smart women have always found Sean attractive. I consider it a compliment.
translation.it: Molte donne lo trovano attraente. Lo considero un complimento.

translation.en: So what you're saying is that if I had been trying to seduce your husband...
translation.it: Quindi, se avessi provato a sedurre tuo marito,

translation.en: you'd still be here?
I'm saying Sean would never cheat on me.
translation.it: Sto dicendo che Sean non mi tradirebbe mai.

translation.en: I trust him.
Trust is the most dangerous thing you can give away, Lisa.
translation.it: La fiducia è la cosa più pericolosa che tu possa dare.

translation.en: But for the sake of argument,
let's take cheating out of the equation.
Say you were fully complicit in our affair.
translation.it: E se fossi complice della nostra relazione?

translation.en: Would that be an acceptable condition of a firm offer to finance your company?
translation.it: Sarebbe una condizione accettabile, per finanziare la tua società?

translation.en: You're asking if I would be willing to trade my husband for my company?
translation.it: Mi sta chiedendo di scambiare mio marito con la mia società?

translation.en: That would not be an acceptable condition...
Let's get out of here.
Lisa, wait, it's just a game.
Like Lionel and his bowl of questions. Only not nearly as original.
translation.it: - Come quello dell'altra sera. - Ma non altrettanto originale.

translation.en: This whole idea was ripped right out of a bad '90s movie.
translation.it: Questo mi ricorda un pessimo film degli anni '90.

translation.en: She wants to have sex with you, Sean.
translation.it: Vuole andare a letto con te.

translation.en: -Plain and simple. -Why?
Because Anne is legendary
for exploiting people's weaknesses to her advantage.
translation.it: per usare le debolezze della gente a suo vantaggio.

translation.en: She sees our marriage as my weakness.
translation.it: In questo caso, il mio matrimonio.

translation.en: Did I get that right?
All but the movie reference.
translation.it: Sì, tranne che per il film.

translation.en: I thought that film was quite decent.
By my calculation, it would take roughly 80 million
translation.it: Secondo i miei calcoli, ci vorrebbero più o meno 80 milioni

translation.en: to optimize your discovery, assuming proof of concept.
translation.it: per la tua idea, ipotizzando che sia fattibile.

translation.en: That's not the kind of investment I'm comfortable making
translation.it: Non sono abituata a fare questi investimenti senza la garanzia

translation.en: without a guarantee that the woman in charge
translation.it: Non sono abituata a fare questi investimenti senza la garanzia che la donna al comando sia disposta

translation.en: is willing to put whatever is necessary on the line to ensure its success.
translation.it: che la donna al comando sia disposta a dare ciò che è necessario per assicurarsi di avere successo.

translation.en: In this case...
a night alone with her husband.
My offer expires in 24 hours.
translation.it: La mia offerta scadrà fra 24 ore.

translation.en: [Anne] What's your name?
-Valerie Simmons. -[Anne] Valerie...
I see you're wearing the same mint Chanel
translation.it: Indossa lo stesso completo di Chanel

translation.en: they put me in for my Forbes spread back in...
translation.it: che mi fecero indossare durante un'intervista di Forbes nel...

translation.en: What was it? 2015? Yes, Miss Montgomery.
Stand up, sweetie.
My lawyers are currently waging a libel suit
translation.it: I miei avvocati stanno facendo causa

translation.en: against that dated rag's former editor,
translation.it: all'ex direttore di quella rivista, per calunnia.

translation.en: and had you done the slightest bit of research,
you might have reconsidered wearing that embarrassing cry for attention,
translation.it: avrebbe evitato questo ridicolo tentativo di attirare l'attenzione,

translation.en: as all you've succeeded in doing today is exposing your own inadequacy.
translation.it: poiché l'unica cosa che è riuscita a fare è stata mostrare la sua inadeguatezza.

translation.en: It's incredible. Eighteen million views in three days.
translation.it: Incredibile. Diciotto milioni di visualizzazioni in tre giorni.

translation.en: Don't do this to yourself.
What kind of person gets off on making others feel stupid
translation.it: Che tipo di persona gode nel far sentire gli altri degli idioti,

translation.en: and powerless and disposable?
A shitty one.
It's weird not having Castro here.
translation.it: È strano non avere Castro qui.

translation.en: I'll meet up with Marcos between shifts and pick him up tomorrow.
translation.it: Andrò a prenderlo domani da Marcos.

translation.en: No, I'll do it.
Tell me again how everything's gonna be okay.
translation.it: Dimmi di nuovo che andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: Everything is going to be okay.
[Lisa] Castro! Come here, Castro!
Oh, hi. How much I missed you!
You and Sean live it up like rock stars the other night?
translation.it: L'altra sera tu e Sean ve la siete spassata.

translation.en: [Lisa] You know it.
After a few drinks, we got to talking about Lionel's challenge
translation.it: Abbiamo iniziato a parlare della sfida di Lionel

translation.en: and decided to order half a dozen couples up to the room.
translation.it: e poi abbiamo invitato sei coppie in camera.

translation.en: Only half a dozen?
-Prude. -Oh, yeah?
I remember when the most risqué thing in your closet was a pinstriped Oxford.
translation.it: Ricordo quando la cosa più trasgressiva nel tuo armadio era una t-shirt a righe.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Now I'm guessing... pleated, leather chaps.
translation.it: Ora mi immagino pantaloni di pelle...

translation.en: Don't! Don't!
Oh. The things we do for our first boyfriends.
translation.it: Cosa non si fa per il primo ragazzo.

translation.en: First and last, hopefully.
I want with Lionel what you have with Sean.
translation.it: Vorrei avere quello che avete voi.

translation.en: What's that, exactly?
Total trust.
And you two are invincible no matter what the universe throws at you.
translation.it: Voi siete invincibili, qualunque cosa accada.

translation.en: Yeah, well, the universe has been having a field day with us recently.
translation.it: Beh, ultimamente ne sono successe di cose.

translation.en: And that brings me to my not-so-elegant segue.
translation.it: Ed è per questo che devo parlarti di una cosa meno elegante.

translation.en: [sighs] Papa would kill me if he knew I was telling you this, but...
translation.it: Papà mi ucciderebbe se sapesse che te l'ho detto, ma...

translation.en: La Cuchara's been going through a rough patch.
translation.it: La Cuchara sta passando un momento difficile.

translation.en: He asked if I knew when you might be able to pay the loan back.
translation.it: Si chiedeva quando pensi di restituirgli i soldi.

translation.en: It's gonna be a while.
How bad is it?
Turns out the money they gave you didn't come from savings.
translation.it: A quanto pare, non erano i soldi dei risparmi.

translation.en: They got a second mortgage on the restaurant.
translation.it: Avevano fatto un secondo mutuo sul ristorante.

translation.en: If they default...
they could lose everything.
All my cases have been pro bono this year, so I'm pretty tapped.
translation.it: Quest'anno ho avuto solo cause pro bono, sono al verde.

translation.en: I'd ask Lionel, but he's been--
No, it's my responsibility, Marcos.
I will take care of it.
[Sean's voice] I'll never forget the day I met my wife.
translation.it: Non dimenticherò mai quando incontrai mia moglie.

translation.en: For those of you who don't know the story, there's this spot in Corona Heights Park
translation.it: Per chi non sa la storia, c'è un posto al Corona Heights Park

translation.en: where my brother and I used to play catch.
translation.it: dove giocavo a nascondino con mio fratello.

translation.en: After he died, it kind of became my go-to place for heavy thinking.
translation.it: Dopo la sua morte, andavo spesso lì per riflettere.

translation.en: Which I was doing a lot of last year,
especially on the day the Giants told me they weren't picking up my contract.
translation.it: dopo che i Giants non mi rinnovarono il contratto.

translation.en: Giants suck!
No, no. I had a terrible season, Archer, you know it, I know it,
translation.it: No, Archer, ho avuto una stagione orrenda e lo sai bene, lo sanno tutti.

translation.en: -the whole city knew it. -Story's got a happy ending, though.
translation.it: No, Archer, ho avuto una stagione orrenda e lo sai bene, lo sanno tutti. La storia ha un lieto fine.

translation.en: I'm getting to that, if you'll let me.
translation.it: Ci sto arrivando, se me lo permetti.

translation.en: So when I get to the park that day...
translation.it: Quel giorno, al parco, ho trovato...

translation.en: I find this...
incredibly beautiful...
really inconvenient grad student sitting on my bench,
translation.it: ...che si era seduta proprio sulla mia panchina,

translation.en: working on her biology thesis.
translation.it: mentre studiava la tesi di biologia.

translation.en: And while there's this massive deadline hanging over her head,
translation.it: Nonostante non mancasse molto alla data di consegna,

translation.en: she took pity on a total stranger... and let me share the bench with her.
translation.it: ebbe pietà di un completo estraneo e mi invitò a sedermi.

translation.en: It wasn't until after the sun went down...
that I realized what...
what started out as one of the toughest days of my life...
translation.it: che uno dei giorni più duri della mia vita

translation.en: had turned into one of the best.
If you hadn't let me sit down with you that day, I... I have
translation.it: Se non mi avessi fatto sedere con te, quel giorno,

translation.en: no idea what my future might have turned into.
translation.it: non so come sarebbe stata la mia vita.

translation.en: [Lisa] Excuse me, sir.
Is this seat taken?
Want me to go first?
Nah, I got the cleat.
Todd and I found out we made it into the fire academy today.
translation.it: Io e Todd siamo entrati nei vigili del fuoco.

translation.en: Oh, my God. That's-- Intense timing.
translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio. È... - Il momento sbagliato.

translation.en: I know.
I'm so proud of you.
Thanks, but both our backs are seriously against the wall right now.
translation.it: Grazie, ma è un momento difficile per entrambi.

translation.en: We can't afford a downshift in income.
translation.it: Non possiamo permetterci di guadagnare meno.

translation.en: Even a temporary one, so I...
translation.it: Anche se è temporaneo. E così,

translation.en: I came here to think about our options.
Everything that's gotten us to this point.
translation.it: Quello che ci ha portato fin qui.

translation.en: And?
And the first thing that popped into my head was how crazy it is we ever met in the first place.
translation.it: E la prima cosa che mi è venuta in mente, è quanto è assurdo esserci incontrati.

translation.en: What if you decided to study at the library that day instead of here?
translation.it: Se fossi andata in biblioteca, invece di venire qui?

translation.en: Or if Todd hadn't gotten called into work. I...
translation.it: O se Todd non fosse andato al lavoro...

translation.en: might have been drowning myself at some bar with him instead of meeting my future wife.
translation.it: Forse sarei andato al bar con lui, invece di conoscere mia moglie.

translation.en: It's a real rabbit hole thinking about the things that had to go exactly right,
translation.it: È incredibile pensare a tutte le cose che sono successe,

translation.en: stuff that had to go so fucking terrible to lead us both to this bench
translation.it: nel bene e nel male, e che ci hanno portato su questa panchina,

translation.en: at that moment, on that day.
So I've been sitting here going over what you said...
translation.it: E ho pensato a quello che hai detto.

translation.en: about...
feeling disposable and--
Powerless.
Yeah.
So now I guess I'm wondering how you'd feel
translation.it: Ora mi chiedo come ti sentiresti,

translation.en: if we made a decision to take some power back.
translation.it: se cercassimo di riprenderci un po' di potere.

translation.en: I've been wondering the same thing.
We've both come through... [sighs] ...a hell of a lot in our lives.
But at least we know... we can trust each other to handle anything.
translation.it: Ma almeno sappiamo che possiamo fidarci l'uno dell'altra.

translation.en: And...
I don't think there's any way someone as patently pathetic as Anne Montgomery
translation.it: Non credo che una persona patetica come Anne Montgomery

translation.en: has what it takes to get in between that, not in one night.
translation.it: possa toglierci tutto questo in una notte.

translation.en: Not in one lifetime.
Well...
we still have a few hours to tell this bitch to go to hell.
translation.it: abbiamo ancora qualche ora per mandare questa stronza all'inferno.

translation.en: But you and me...
we're a lot stronger than she thinks we are.
translation.it: ...siamo più forti di quanto lei creda.

translation.en: So are we saying we're good to do this?
I am if you are.
Then let's do it.
Hello, Lisa.
[Lisa] We accept your offer.
I'll send a car.
Why don't you pour yourself a whiskey.
I don't think so.
There's no need to be nervous. No one said we were.
translation.it: - Non siate nervosi. - Chi ha detto che lo siamo?

translation.en: Sean, come here for a sec.
She wrote a clause into the contract excluding you from sharing any details
translation.it: C'è una clausola che dice che non dovrai dirmi niente

translation.en: about what happens after I leave here tonight.
[whispers] If you say anything to me or anyone else, we lose the company.
translation.it: Se ne parli con me, o con altri, perderemo la società.

translation.en: Why would either of us ever want to talk about this again?
The quicker we put tonight behind us, the better.
translation.it: Tanto meglio lasciarsi subito tutto alle spalle.

translation.en: We just have to trust each other.
[scoffs] It's not you I don't trust.
translation.it: Non è di te che non mi fido.

translation.en: I assume you saw the space for your company's routing numbers.
translation.it: Avrai visto dove indicare l'IBAN della tua società.

translation.en: That's why we're here, isn't it?
translation.it: È per questo che siamo qui.

translation.en: Well, it's certainly why you're here.
You'll receive a good faith wire transfer
totaling a quarter of my investment, tomorrow morning.
translation.it: con un quarto della somma domattina.

translation.en: Twenty million dollars.
Well...
it appears there's only one thing left to do.
translation.it: Sembra sia rimasta una sola cosa da fare.

translation.en: Well, two.
Foster, we'll need a witness.
Sean, may I have your phone, please?
translation.it: Sean, posso avere il tuo telefono?

translation.en: Why do you need his phone?
If you're having second thoughts, now is the time to share them.
translation.it: Se ci state ripensando, discutetene ora.

translation.en: Not some desperate text in the middle of the night.
translation.it: Non voglio messaggi disperati nel bel mezzo della notte.

translation.en: Thank you.
I'll let you say goodbye.
I love you.
[whispers] I love you.
Oh, keep the pen. It's one of many.
translation.it: Puoi tenerla. È solo una delle tante.

translation.en: Come sit with me by the fire.
If it's okay, can we not talk anymore and just...
do what you brought me here to do?
translation.it: e fare quello per cui sono qui?

translation.en: Well, aren't you just so sweet and innocent?
I haven't even begun to tell you what it is you're doing here.
translation.it: Non ti ho neanche detto perché sei qui.

translation.en: In science, one of the first things you learn
translation.it: Una delle prime cose che la scienza mi ha insegnato,

translation.en: is that you can only trust the things that you can prove.
translation.it: è che puoi fidarti solo di quello che puoi dimostrare.

translation.en: But if any of you guys ask me to offer...
translation.it: Ma se qualcuno di voi mi chiedesse di fornire...

translation.en: physical proof of...
just how much Sean means to me...
translation.it: di quello che Sean significa per me,

translation.en: there's no empirical way that I could.
translation.it: non ci sarebbe modo di farlo.

translation.en: [Lisa] And this is what's called...
the scientific paradox.
-Oh, my God. I am so bad at this. -[crowd laughs]
translation.it: Mio Dio. Sono tremenda in queste cose.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
What I'm...
trying to say is...
translation.it: Quello... che voglio dire... LE PARTI NON POTRANNO DISCUTERE

translation.en: -Falling in love with Sean has taught me-- -[sighs]
translation.it: ...è che innamorarmi di Sean mi ha insegnato

translation.en: ...it's just as important to trust the things that you can feel...
translation.it: che è importante fidarmi dei miei sentimenti,

translation.en: as the things you can prove.
translation.it: come di ciò che posso dimostrare.

translation.en: Fuck!
Hello? Can anybody hear me?
-[elevator bell dings] -Fuck.
Sean!
Sean! Call it off!
They're gone.
Where did you take them?
When I returned, the residence was empty.
Mrs. Montgomery? Are you okay?
Everything's all right, Gabriel. The young lady's under contract.
translation.it: Va tutto bene, Gabriel. La signora ha un contratto.

translation.en: Keycard, please.
What does she get out of it?
Treating people like toys?
translation.it: A trattare la gente come giocattoli.

translation.en: What motivates Miss Montgomery is far more nuanced than I could say.
translation.it: Non è facile spiegare cosa spinga la sig.ra Montgomery ad agire,

translation.en: But I have never seen her waste a minute of time on anything...
translation.it: ma non l'ho mai vista perdere un solo minuto con qualcosa

translation.en: or anyone...
so insignificant as a toy.
Hello, Cassidy?
[Cassidy] Where have you been? Did you get any of my messages?
translation.it: Dove sei stata? Hai ricevuto i miei messaggi?

translation.en: [sighs] No, I...
What's happened?
Anne Montgomery just saved our ass to the tune of $20 million.
translation.it: Anne Montgomery ci ha salvato il culo con 20 milioni di dollari.

translation.en: That's what happened.
translation.it: Ecco che è successo. Qualunque cosa tu abbia fatto,

translation.en: Whatever the hell you did to win her over, it could not have paid off any huger.
translation.it: Ecco che è successo. Qualunque cosa tu abbia fatto, - non poteva andare meglio. - Ti richiamo.

translation.en: I'll call you back.
translation.it: - non poteva andare meglio. - Ti richiamo.

translation.en: Are you okay?
Hey, buddy.
Your hand... What did she...?
translation.it: La tua mano... Cosa ti ha...

translation.en: We're not allowed to talk about it.
You can... if you want to.
[Lisa] The contract isn't triggered until I start spending her money.
translation.it: Il contratto non ha validità fin quando non uso i soldi.

translation.en: Then start spending it.
Nothing I say now will undo what we did. Might as well get what you wanted.
translation.it: Parlarne non servirà. Almeno avrai quello che volevi.

translation.en: What I wanted?
Sean, I went back for you. I tried to stop it.
translation.it: Sono tornata indietro per te. Ho provato a fermarti.

translation.en: Say something.
I need to take a shower.
Your breakfast meeting has arrived.
translation.it: Il suo meeting sta per iniziare.

translation.en: I'll tell 'em you're indisposed.
You think I'm a terrible person, don't you?
translation.it: Credi che sia una persona orribile, vero?

translation.en: I think when you've suffered terrible things...
translation.it: Credo che se hai sofferto cose orribili,

translation.en: you become capable of terrible things.
Have the staff clear my calendar. I won't be taking any meetings this morning.
translation.it: Cancella i miei appuntamenti di stamattina.

translation.en: ♪ Give me more ♪
♪ Underneath and inside ♪
translation.it: DONOVAN CROLLA E VIENE FATTO USCIRE

translation.en: ♪ Just to come around ♪ ♪ More, give me more, give me more ♪
translation.it: UOMO IN FIN DI VITA AGGRESSORE SCONOSCIUTO
